hYDRAS:

rtress

hoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Alliance?


"Alright, then I believe our busine=
ss is complete." replied Perseus.  "I will keep you updated."

At that, he =
turned to signal the shuttle to return and pick up the team; then the whole=
 team walked toward the landing zone.

s to stay in contact on this radio frequency", he said, handing a disk with=
 encryption information to Hydras.  "We always have someone monitoring the =
radio, so if you get any information, go ahead and give us a call."
